00052 class ZIP_API CZipExtraField
00053 {
00054  friend class CZipFileHeader;
00055 public:
00056  CZipExtraField(){}
00057  CZipExtraField(const CZipExtraField& arr)
00058  {  
00059   *this = arr;
00060  }
00061  CZipExtraField& operator=(const CZipExtraField& field)
00062  {
00063   Clear();
00064   for (int i = 0; i < field.GetCount(); i++)
00065    Add(new CZipExtraData(*field.GetAt(i)));
00066   return *this;
00067  }
00068 
00075  int GetTotalSize() const;
00076 
00083  bool Validate() const
00084  {
00085   return GetTotalSize() <= USHRT_MAX;
00086  }
00087  
00094  int GetCount() const
00095  {
00096   return (int)m_aData.GetSize();
00097  }
00098 
00108  CZipExtraData* GetAt(int index) const
00109  {  
00110   return m_aData.GetAt(index);
00111  }
00112 
00119  void RemoveAt(int index)
00120  {
00121   delete (GetAt(index));
00122   m_aData.RemoveAt(index);
00123  }
00124 
00134  int Add(CZipExtraData* pExtra)
00135  {
00136   return (int)m_aData.Add(pExtra);
00137  }
00138 
00152  CZipExtraData* CreateNew(WORD headerID)
00153  {
00154   int temp;
00155   return CreateNew(headerID, temp);
00156  }
00157 
00175  CZipExtraData* CreateNew(WORD headerID, int& idx)
00176  {
00177   CZipExtraData* pData = new CZipExtraData(headerID);
00178   idx = (int)m_aData.Add(pData);
00179   return pData;
00180  }
00181 
00186  void RemoveInternalHeaders();
00187 
00197  CZipExtraData* Lookup(WORD headerID) const
00198  {
00199   int temp;
00200   return Lookup(headerID, temp);
00201  }
00202 
00212  bool HasHeader(WORD headerID)
00213  {
00214   return Lookup(headerID) != NULL;
00215  }
00216 
00230  CZipExtraData* Lookup(WORD headerID, int& index) const;
00231  ~CZipExtraField()
00232  {
00233   Clear();
00234  }
00235 protected:
00236 
00240  void Clear()
00241  {
00242   for (int i = 0; i < GetCount(); i++)
00243    delete (GetAt(i));
00244   m_aData.RemoveAll();
00245  }
